headline: Hilton and M&L Group Announce First Waldorf Astoria Hotel in The Nordics
summary: HELSINKI, Finland - Hilton has announced today the signing of a management agreement with M&L Group for The Hotel Maria in Helsinki, which will be re-branded as Waldorf Astoria Helsinki. This marks...

headline: JPMorgan Rates Hilton Overweight, Projects Strong EBITDA Growth
summary: Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (NYSE:HLT) ranks among the best cyclical stocks to buy now. On June 23, JPMorgan began coverage of Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (NYSE:HLT) with a $282 price target and an Overweight rating. With a high-single-digit EBITDA growth potential and a robust free cash flow conversion of 50–55%, the investment bank sees Hilton […]
